channel.title: I need help with port fowarding
channel.description: OK I dont know anything about port fowarding.. i have a no-ip thing i have a server that i want online but how do i port forward i do not know how to get in my main firewall or router... :( PLEASE HELP[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 02:11:52 PM[/size][hr]please someone help

item.title: I need help with port fowarding
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

Ok once you have created an account type in your server name e.g (mescape) and click on the no-ip.biz and chose no-ip.org (thats the one I always use) then type in you ip address you can get that from here http://www.whatsmyip.org/ its at the bottom. Then click create server on the no-ip website. Now go to this http://www.download.com/No-IP-DUC-Dynamic-Update-Client-/3000-2165-10055182.html?part=dl-NoIPDUCDy&subj=dl&tag=button
download it then install it and open it and you server name should be there with a simile face next to it and make sure the box next to it is ticked and then run your server and log in!
Hope That Helps!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with port fowarding

i did all that but whenever my friend trys to log on it he cant…i tell him the port…5555 and the no ip i used for no ip and that is deadfast.no-ip.info n he cant log in when i tell him to…why??? [br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 02:32:01 PM[/size][hr]am i suposed to do sumthin else with no-ip that i havnt done…iv got the no-ip DUC i have a registed thing…
i made a host name
what else do i do…

Read full topic

@GuNtRiX wrote:

You dont have to port forward if you use no-ip.
Have you used no-ip correctly check on this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,100669.msg1025068.html#msg1025068
